ygData.subject: Re: New Cleric heal spell idea.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, we get 2 group heals I believe, the first is word of health, which in my normal parties only heals about half a bub per person (if that much). The better
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, we get 2 group heals I believe, the first is word of health, which in
my normal parties only heals about half a bub per person (if that much).
The better version of this spell heals a lot more. I think it is a level
49 spell.

On Mon, 27 Sep 1999, Sianne . wrote:

> From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
>
> Do we not get a group heal later in our careers? And another question, i am
> a lvl 26, i use an RTS as a weapon, i am looking for an observer staff...,
> but my question is what armor should i be trying to acquire at this point?
>
> Sianne - Xegony
>
>
> >From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] New Cleric heal spell idea.....
> >Date: Mon, 27 Sep 1999 10:02:50 -0400
> >
> >From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> >
> >there's already a spell like that <well, 2 actually>....druids and shamans
> >get
> >it..it's called regeneration and chloroplast, and they do get group ones as
> >well
> >
> >John Erik Maynus wrote:
> >
> > > From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>
> > >
> > > I think once they come out with the add-on and give us new lvls and new
> > > spells one cool idea for a heal spell is....... A spell you cast say
> >before
> > > you fight and it works like the Bards heal song and heals you a little
> >over
> > > time. Have a icon the shows up like any buffs you have on a stay for
> >5-10
> > > mins. Maybe later do a group heal spell like this one. I'm not saying
> >to
> > > have to heal us or someone says a lot but just a little over time, maybe
> > > have a few, (depends on how many lvls they give us), and say the first
> >one
> > > does 5 heal points so many secs, the next one does 20 every so many
> >secs.
> > > Just an idea. What do you all think on that idea?
> > >

> > > Azor Spellbound
> > > Lvl 20 Human Cleric of The Rathe
